info
```{r}
source("setup.R")
```

```{python}
from dgplots import *
```



```{python}
oystercatcher_py = pd.read_csv("data/CS2-oystercatcher-feeding.csv")
```

```{python}
# define the model
model = smf.ols(formula= "feeding ~ C(site)", data = oystercatcher_py)
# fit the model
results = model.fit()
```

```{python}
test = dgplots(results)
```

```{python}
from datetime import datetime

date = datetime.now().strftime("%Y_%m_%d-%I:%M:%S_%p")
print(f"filename_{date}")

test.savefig(fname=(f"images/{date}_dgplots" ".png"))
```

```{python}
import glob
import os
# get list of images created by dgplots
list_of_files = glob.glob('images/*dgplots.png')
# get the latest file
latest_file = max(list_of_files, key=os.path.getctime)
```

```{r}
knitr::include_graphics(py$latest_file)
```

```{python}
state_py = pd.read_csv("data/CS3-statedata.csv")
```

```{python}
# define the model
model = smf.ols(formula= "population ~ area + murder", data = state_py)
# fit the model
results = model.fit()
```

```{python}
test = dgplots(results)
```

```{python}
from datetime import datetime

date = datetime.now().strftime("%Y_%m_%d-%I:%M:%S_%p")
print(f"filename_{date}")

test.savefig(fname=(f"images/{date}_dgplots" ".png"))
```
